headline.main: Ho Chi Minh Was Noted for Success in Blending Nationalism and Communism; From Youth He Pursued A Goal of Independence

abstract: Ho Chi Minh's career revd; illus
snippet: Among 20th-century statesmen, Ho Chi Minh was remarkable both for the tenacity and patience with which he pursued his goal of Vietnamese independence and for his success in blending Communism with nationalism.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: GENERAL POLICIES OF BELLIGERENTS, OTHER MAJOR POWERS
